column5: We are gonna have some good rain this week. This should bring more salmon into the river, and the big ones closer to the shore, I imagine!!!  I am still waiting for my first salmon...oh, how envy I was when I kept reading the reports....  Cheers!
ye I hope so too. Haven't landed any salmon as of eyt this year but have been spooled and lost a bunch. Got the right setup now so let the war begin!!!!
